00038 template <typename Point>
00039 class FilterKruskal
00040 {
00041   typedef typename std::vector<Point>::size_type size_type;
00042   typedef std::pair<size_type, size_type> Edge;
00043   typedef typename std::vector<WSP<Point> >::iterator WspIter;
00044   typedef typename std::vector<WSP<Point>*>::iterator WspPIter;
00045   typedef std::pair<Edge, float> WEdge;
00046   typedef comp_quad_tree_node<Point>* CqPtr;
00047   
00048 public:
00049   
00055   void run(WspIter begin, WspIter end, int THold=1)
00056   {
00057     pivot_index = (1000*wspd.Points.size())/(end-begin);
00058     double thold = floor(log((double)wspd.Points.size()));
00059     if(THold != 0) thold = THold;
00060     recurse_filter_kruskal3(begin, end, (int) thold);
00061   };
00062 
00069   FilterKruskal(pwspd<Point> &w, int_partition &uf, 
00070                 std::vector<Edge> &mst, size_type t=20) : wspd(w), 
00071                                                      ufpred(uf,w.cqtree, w.Points),
00072                                                      Uf(uf), 
00073                                                      Mst(mst),
00074                                                      threshold(t)
00075   {
00076     bccpTotal=0;
00077     samples.resize(1000);
00078   };

00080 private:
00081   pwspd<Point> &wspd;
00082   bccpPred<Point> bccp;
00083   boxLengthPred<Point> blpred;
00084   unionFindPred<Point> ufpred;
00085   boxDistPredMin<Point> bdpredmin;
00086   boxDistPredMax<Point> bdpredmax;
00087   bccpDistPred<Point> bccppred;
00088   calcBccpPred<Point> calcbccppred;
00089   int_partition &Uf;
00090   std::vector<Edge> &Mst;
00091   size_type threshold;
00092   size_type pivot_index;
00093   int bccpTotal;
00094   int wspd_size;
00095   std::vector<WspIter> samples;
00096 
00097   WspIter findPivot(WspIter begin, WspIter end)
00098   {
00099     double range = (double) (end-begin);
00100     
00101     for(unsigned int i=0;i < samples.size();++i)
00102       {
00103         samples[i] = (begin+((size_type) (__drand48__()*range)));
00104       }
00105     
00106     sort(samples.begin(), samples.end(), bccp);
00107     return samples[pivot_index];
00108   };
00109   
00110   void recurse_filter_kruskal3(WspIter begin, WspIter end, int Thold)
00111   {
00112     if(end-begin == 0) return;
00113 
00114     //Walk through the loop
00115     //for every element of
00116     //size > threshold,
00117     //calculate the BCCP
00118     //and maintain the minimum
00119     //non-computed bccp
00120     WspIter I;
00121     double minBccp = (std::numeric_limits<double>::max)();
00122     calcbccppred.minBccp = &minBccp;
00123     calcbccppred.THold = Thold;
00124 #ifdef _GLIBCXX_PARALLEL
00125     I = partition(begin, end, calcbccppred, __gnu_parallel::sequential_tag());
00126 #else
00127     I = partition(begin, end, calcbccppred);
00128 #endif
00129     //Partition the computed BCCP into 
00130     //everything smaller and larger than the
00131     //smallest non-computed BCCP
00132     bdpredmin.minBccp = minBccp;
00133     WspIter cpart = partition(begin, I, bdpredmin);
00134     //Partition and process every computed
00135     //BCCP smaller than the smallest non_computed
00136     //BCCP
00137     part_and_process(begin, cpart);
00138     if(Mst.size() >= wspd.Points.size())
00139       return;
00140     
00141     
00142     //Filter everything that's left
00143     WspIter fpart = partition(cpart, end, ufpred);
00144     //Repeat with double the threshold
00145     recurse_filter_kruskal3(cpart, fpart, Thold*2);
00146     
00147   };
00148   
00149   void part_and_process(WspIter begin, WspIter end)
00150   {
00151     if((unsigned int) (end-begin) < (wspd.Points.size()*10))
00152       {
00153         Kruskal(begin, end);
00154       }
00155     else
00156       {
00157         WspIter I = findPivot(begin, end);
00158         bdpredmin.minBccp = I->get_bccp_dist();
00159         I = partition(begin, end, bdpredmin);
00160         Kruskal(begin, I);
00161         if(Mst.size() >= wspd.Points.size())
00162           return;
00163         WspIter fpart = partition(I, end, ufpred);
00164         part_and_process(I, fpart);
00165       }
00166   }
00167 
00168   void Kruskal(WspIter begin, WspIter end)
00169   {
00170     size_type first, second;
00171     Point *f,*s,*z;
00172 
00173     if(end-begin==0) return;
00174 
00175     sort(begin, end, bccp);
00176     //Find the address of the first element in
00177     //The z-order sorted vector of points
00178     z = &(*(wspd.Points.begin()));
00179     
00180     for(WspIter i=begin;i != end;++i)
00181       {
00182         //Find the index of the bccp points
00183         //from the pointer to them
00184         f = (Point*) (i->first);
00185         s = (Point*) (i->second);
00186         first = f-z;
00187         second = s-z;
00188 
00189         //Check the Union Find data structure
00190         //if the bccp points are not allready
00191         //connected, join them in the UF and add
00192         //them to the MST
00193         if(Uf.find(first) != Uf.find(second))
00194         {
00195           Mst.push_back(Edge(first, second));
00196           Uf.union_blocks(first, second);
00197           if(Mst.size() >= wspd.Points.size())
00198             return;
00199         }
00200       }
00201   };
00202   
00203   void recurse_filter_kruskal(WspIter begin, WspIter end, int THold)
00204   {
00205     
00206     WspIter part,fpart, part1, part2;
00207         
00208     if(end-begin < 1000)
00209       {
00210         Kruskal(begin, end);
00211       }
00212     else
00213       {
00214         findPivot(begin, end, bdpredmin, bdpredmax);
00215 
00216         do
00217           {
00218             MyTimer A;
00219             part1 = partition(begin, end, bdpredmin);
00220             std::cout << "Part1 size: " << end-begin << " Time: " << A << std::endl;
00221             if(part1==begin) bdpredmin.minBccp*=2;
00222           }
00223         while(part1==begin);
00224 
00225         bdpredmax.maxBccp = bdpredmin.minBccp;
00226         part2 = partition(part1, end, bdpredmax);
00227         do_bccp(part1, part2);
00228         bccppred.maxBccp = bdpredmin.minBccp;
00229         part  = partition(part1, part2, bccppred);
00230         Kruskal(begin, part);
00231         fpart = partition(part, end, ufpred);
00232         recurse_filter_kruskal(part, fpart, THold);
00233       }
00234   }
00235 
00236   void do_bccp(WspIter begin, WspIter end)
00237   {
00238     for(WspIter i=begin;i != end;++i)
00239       (*i).bccp();
00240   }
00241   
00242 void recurse_filter_kruskal2(WspIter begin, WspIter end, int Thold)
00243 {
00244   std::cout << Thold << " Range: " << end-begin << std::endl;
00245   if(end-begin == 0) return;
00246 
00247   //Walk through the loop
00248   //for every element of
00249   //size > threshold,
00250   //calculate the BCCP
00251   WspIter I;
00252   for(I=begin;I != end;++I)
00253     {
00254       if(I->size()<=Thold)
00255         {
00256           //std::cout << I->size() << std::endl;
00257           I->bccp();
00258         }
00259     }
00260 
00261   //Sort all valid WSPs based on
00262   //BCCP value (Note: in this case
00263   //BCCP is either the actual BCCP value
00264   //or the minimum possible BCCP value)
00265   std::cout << "sorting" << std::endl;
00266   sort(begin, end, bccp);
00267 
00268   //Find the first WSP for which the BCCP
00269   //Has not yet been calculated
00270   I=begin;
00271   while(I->bccp_done())
00272     {
00273       ++I;
00274     }
00275   std::cout << "Minimum non-computed bccp: " << I->get_bccp_dist() << std::endl;
00276   std::cout << "\tTo Kruskal: " << I-begin <<  " " << begin->size() << " " << end-begin << std::endl;
00277 
00278   //Send the first block of WSPs
00279   //That have had their BCCP calulated
00280   //To be tested/added to the MST
00281   Kruskal2(begin, I);
00282 
00283   //Partition the remaining WSPs to filter
00284   //out any pairs that have allready been
00285   //connected
00286   std::cout << "Filtering" << std::endl;
00287   WspIter fpart = partition(I, end, ufpred);
00288   std::cout << "filtered : " << end-fpart << std::endl;
00289 
00290   //Double the threshold value and recurse on any elements
00291   //that are left
00292   recurse_filter_kruskal2(I, fpart, Thold*2);
00293 }
00294 
00295   void Kruskal2(WspIter begin, WspIter end)
00296   {
00297     size_type first, second;
00298     Point *f,*s,*z;
00299 
00300     if(end-begin==0) return;
00301 
00302     //Find the address of the first element in
00303     //The z-order sorted vector of points
00304     z = &(*(wspd.Points.begin()));
00305     
00306     for(WspIter i=begin;i != end;++i)
00307       {
00308         //Find the index of the bccp points
00309         //from the pointer to them
00310         f = (Point*) (i->first);
00311         s = (Point*) (i->second);
00312         first = f-z;
00313         second = s-z;
00314 
00315         //Check the Union Find data structure
00316         //if the bccp points are not allready
00317         //connected, join them in the UF and add
00318         //them to the MST
00319         if(Uf.find(first) != Uf.find(second))
00320         {
00321           Mst.push_back(Edge(first, second));
00322           Uf.union_blocks(first, second);
00323         }
00324       }
00325   };
